name: Saving Froppa
description:
A short visual novel about frogs trying to save their froggy world. made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

Music & sxf by Samantha van der Sluis.

https://twitter.com/sam_vandersluis

Programming, art & story by SugarBeetle.

https://twitter.com/SugarBeetles

Typewriter sound effects by aquapaulo

https://github.com/aquapaulo/renpy-typewriter-sounds/tree/main
